hardWrittenSQLSelect.title: Hard Written SQL SELECT
hardWrittenSQLSelect.explanation: SELECT queries must be avoided. Use the Magento Framework methods instead or a custom repository with a getList and/or getById methods.

hardWrittenSQLDelete.title: Hard Written SQL DELETE
hardWrittenSQLDelete.explanation: DELETE queries must be avoided. Use the Magento Framework methods instead or a custom repository with a delete and/or deleteById methods.

hardWrittenSQLUpdate.title: Hard Written SQL UPDATE
hardWrittenSQLUpdate.explanation: UPDATE queries should be avoided. Use the Magento Framework methods instead or a custom repository with a save method. It can be faster for large amounts of data but it can lead to data loss in case of an update.

hardWrittenSQLInsert.title: Hard Written SQL INSERT
hardWrittenSQLInsert.explanation: INSERT queries should be avoided. Use the Magento Framework methods instead or a custom repository with a save method. It can be faster for large amounts of data but it can lead to data loss in case of an update.

hardWrittenSQLJoin.title: Hard Written SQL JOIN
hardWrittenSQLJoin.explanation: JOIN queries should be avoided. Use the Magento Framework methods instead.

useCacheable.title: Use of cacheable="false" in layout XML
useCacheable.explanation: Cacheable="false" is not recommended for dynamic blocks and should be avoided. If you need to use cacheable="false" for a block, make sure it is necessary and that the block should not be cached (e.g. : Customer Section, sales...).

unusedModules.title: Unused Modules
unusedModules.explanation: The following modules are not active. Consider removing them.

sameModulePlugin.title: Same Module Plugin
sameModulePlugin.explanation: Plugin class must not be in the same module as the plugged in class.

blockViewModelRatio.title: Block vs ViewModel Ratio
blockViewModelRatio.explanation: The ratio of Block files to ViewModel files is too high. This can be a sign of poor code organization.

magentoFrameworkPlugin.title: Magento Framework Plugin
magentoFrameworkPlugin.explanation: Plugged in class must not be in the Magento Framework. They are called several times and can lead to performance issues.

configProviderPlugin.title: Config Provider Plugin
configProviderPlugin.explanation: Plugin class must not be plugged on any of the config provider classes. You must define a config provider to do any modifications on the configuration.

aroundToBeforePlugin.title: Around to Before Plugin
aroundToBeforePlugin.explanation: Around plugin should be a before plugin. Around plugins drastically decrease performances of the website and should be reserved to really specific cases.

aroundToAfterPlugin.title: Around to After Plugin
aroundToAfterPlugin.explanation: Around plugin should be an after plugin. Around plugins drastically decrease performances of the website and should be reserved to really specific cases.
